text: Don Marion Davis (October 9, 1917 - December 10, 2020) was an American child actor. He was born in Hollywood, California. He appeared in many movies during the silent era. While he mostly appeared in comedy shorts, his feature-length movies include Down on the Farm and A Small Town Idol. Davis died on December 10, 2020 in Tucson, Arizona at the age of 103.Don Davis ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1917 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American silent movie actors Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Hollywood
title: Don Marion Davis
